text:
@realDonaldTrump Trump doesn’t manage anything. He doesn’t organize anyone. He doesn’t administer or oversee or supervise. He doesn’t read memos. He hates meetings. He has no patience for briefings. 
His White House is in perpetual chaos. 
He is no president. 
https://t.co/YhHqHyaK8d
